room_title: Escape room "The Italian Job" by Escape Brigade in Chicago
room_address: 2720 South River Road Ste 12 Des Plaines, IL 60018
room_description:
Journey with us, as you and your team of thieves travel down the cobblestone steps of Venice. You have just pulled off a successful heist and stole $35 million dollars in gold bar, however, your former associate, Steve, has double-crossed you and took off with all the gold — mama mia!
After hearing he has stashed it in a nearby Italian cafe, you have one hour to break into the café's high-security system, steal back your gold bars and escape!
